en.title: Mastering Generative AI & Agents for Developers
en.text: Really excited about this upcoming 5-week weekend course! It's packed with live presentations and hands-on projects that'll help me level up into an AI-powered developer. Can't wait to dive deep into Large Language Models, AI agents, and Generative AI tech. Perfect timing as I'm looking to integrate these cutting-edge capabilities into my development workflow. The fact it's designed for developers like me makes it even better!

es.title: Dominando IA Generativa y Agentes para Desarrolladores
es.text: Próximo curso de 5 semanas solo los fines de semana con presentaciones en vivo y proyectos prácticos. Este programa avanzado está diseñado para convertir a los desarrolladores en ingenieros potenciados por IA, proporcionando experiencia especializada con Modelos de Lenguaje Grande (LLMs), agentes de IA y tecnologías de IA Generativa.

fr.title: Maîtriser l'IA Générative et les Agents pour Développeurs
fr.text: Cours à venir de 5 semaines en week-end uniquement avec des présentations en direct et des projets pratiques. Ce programme avancé est conçu pour transformer les développeurs en ingénieurs alimentés par l'IA, fournissant une expertise spécialisée avec les grands modèles de langage (LLMs), les agents IA et les technologies d'IA générative.

ko.title: 개발자를 위한 생성형 AI 및 에이전트 마스터링
ko.text: 라이브 프레젠테이션과 실습 프로젝트가 포함된 5주 주말 전용 과정입니다. 이 고급 프로그램은 개발자를 AI 기반 엔지니어로 레벨업시키도록 설계되었으며, 대규모 언어 모델(LLM), AI 에이전트 및 생성형 AI 기술에 대한 전문 지식을 제공합니다.

en.title: ICT System Support Bootcamp
en.text: Just finished this brilliant 8-week bootcamp that really strengthened my understanding of IT infrastructure! Got hands-on with PC hardware, Windows Server environments, and networking fundamentals. The Azure and AWS modules were particularly eye-opening - spent loads of time setting up VMs and exploring cloud services. It's been invaluable for understanding the infrastructure side of things, which has already helped me be a better developer. Really glad I took the time to round out my skills, and gained a City & Guilds Level 2 ICT System Support diploma in the process! Click here to view certificate

es.title: Bootcamp de Soporte de Sistemas TIC
es.text: Completé un bootcamp intensivo de 8 semanas enfocado en el soporte de sistemas TI del mundo real e infraestructura. El programa incluyó experiencia práctica con instalación y solución de problemas de hardware de PC, configuración de entornos Windows Cliente/Servidor y conceptos básicos de redes. Trabajé extensamente con Microsoft Azure, exploré Amazon Web Services (AWS) y adquirí conocimiento práctico de plataformas en la nube, provisión de servicios TI y mejores prácticas de soporte. Haga clic aquí para ver el certificado

fr.title: Bootcamp de Support des Systèmes TIC
fr.text: J'ai complété un bootcamp intensif de 8 semaines axé sur le support des systèmes informatiques et l'infrastructure du monde réel. Le programme comprenait une expérience pratique avec l'installation et le dépannage du matériel PC, la configuration des environnements Windows Client/Serveur et les concepts de base du réseau. J'ai travaillé de manière approfondie avec Microsoft Azure, exploré Amazon Web Services (AWS) et acquis des connaissances pratiques des plateformes cloud. Cliquez ici pour voir le certificat

ko.title: ICT 시스템 지원 부트캠프
ko.text: 실제 IT 시스템 지원 및 인프라에 중점을 둔 8주 집중 부트캠프를 완료했습니다. PC 하드웨어 설치 및 문제 해결, Windows 클라이언트/서버 환경 구성, 핵심 네트워킹 개념에 대한 실습 경험을 포함했습니다. Microsoft Azure와 AWS를 광범위하게 다루었고 클라우드 플랫폼, IT 서비스 제공 및 지원 모범 사례에 대한 실용적인 지식을 얻었습니다.

en.title: AI /Machine Learning Engineer Career Path
en.text: Currently working through this comprehensive AI/ML career path - it's been absolutely fascinating! Learning how modern AI actually works under the hood, from neural networks to model training. The hands-on projects are brilliant - I've built my own models and really enjoyed getting to grips with the maths behind it all. Still loads to learn but getting more confident with each module!

es.title: Ruta Profesional de Ingeniero de IA / Aprendizaje Automático
es.text: Actualmente inscrito en la Ruta Profesional de Ingeniero de IA / Aprendizaje Automático, centrado en tecnologías de IA y aprendizaje automático.

fr.title: Parcours de Carrière d'Ingénieur en IA / Apprentissage Automatique
fr.text: Actuellement inscrit au Parcours de Carrière d'Ingénieur en IA / Apprentissage Automatique, axé sur les technologies d'IA et d'apprentissage automatique.

ko.title: AI / 머신러닝 엔지니어 커리어 패스
ko.text: AI 및 머신러닝 기술에 중점을 둔 AI / 머신러닝 엔지니어 커리어 패스에 등록되어 있습니다.

en.title: Data and Programming Foundations for AI
en.text: Currently working through the foundations - it's been brilliant for solidifying my understanding! Covering essential data structures, algorithms, and programming concepts specifically for AI applications. The Python focus is perfect as it's the go-to language for AI/ML work.

es.title: Fundamentos de Datos y Programación para IA
es.text: Actualmente inscrito en el curso de Fundamentos de Datos y Programación para IA, enfocado en los conceptos básicos de análisis de datos y programación.

fr.title: Fondements de la Programmation et des Données pour l'IA
fr.text: Actuellement inscrit au cours de Fondements de la Programmation et des Données pour l'IA, axé sur les bases de l'analyse de données et de la programmation.

ko.title: AI를 위한 데이터 및 프로그래밍 기초
ko.text: 데이터 분석과 프로그래밍의 기초에 중점을 둔 AI를 위한 데이터 및 프로그래밍 기초 과정을 현재 수강 중입니다.

en.title: Build a Machine Learning Model
en.text: Deep diving into ML model building right now! Working with large datasets and learning about feature engineering, model selection, and training techniques. The hands-on approach with real data is fantastic - nothing beats actually building and training your own models!

es.title: Ruta Profesional de Ingeniero de IA / Aprendizaje Automático
es.text: Actualmente inscrito en la Ruta Profesional de Ingeniero de IA / Aprendizaje Automático, centrado en tecnologías de IA y aprendizaje automático.

fr.title: Parcours de Carrière d'Ingénieur en IA / Apprentissage Automatique
fr.text: Actuellement inscrit au Parcours de Carrière d'Ingénieur en IA / Apprentissage Automatique, axé sur les technologies d'IA et d'apprentissage automatique.

ko.title: AI / 머신러닝 엔지니어 커리어 패스
ko.text: AI 및 머신러닝 기술에 중점을 둔 AI / 머신러닝 엔지니어 커리어 패스에 등록되어 있습니다.

en.title: Front End Engineer Career Path
en.text: Initially started this to keep up with agency work demands, but ended up absolutely loving it! The visual and interactive aspects were brilliant - spent hours perfecting UI components and animations. With tight deadlines at work, I had to learn fast and practise loads. Managed to complete it alongside the Full Stack path, which was intense but so rewarding!

es.title: Ruta Profesional de Ingeniero Front End
es.text: Completé la Ruta Profesional de Ingeniero Front End, especializándome en tecnologías de desarrollo front-end.

fr.title: Parcours de Carrière d'Ingénieur Front End
fr.text: J'ai terminé le Parcours de Carrière d'Ingénieur Front End, spécialisé dans les technologies de développement front-end.

ko.title: 프론트 엔드 엔지니어 커리어 패스
ko.text: 프론트 엔드 엔지니어 커리어 패스를 완료하여 프론트 엔드 개발 기술을 전문적으로 습득했습니다.

en.title: Estio Lv4 Software Developer Apprenticeship
en.text: Completed my Level 4 Software Developer Apprenticeship with Estio - this was where my professional journey really began! Gained solid foundations in software development principles, agile methodologies, and best practices. The programme brilliantly combined real-world work experience with structured learning. Really helped build my confidence as a developer!

es.title: Aprendizaje de Desarrollador de Software Estio Lv4
es.text: Completé un aprendizaje de Desarrollador de Software de Nivel 4, adquiriendo experiencia en los principios y prácticas del desarrollo de software.

fr.title: Apprentissage de Développeur Logiciel Estio Lv4
fr.text: J'ai terminé un apprentissage de Développeur Logiciel de Niveau 4, acquérant de l'expérience dans les principes et pratiques du développement logiciel.

ko.title: Estio Lv4 소프트웨어 개발자 견습 과정
ko.text: 레벨 4 소프트웨어 개발자 견습 과정을 이수하여 소프트웨어 개발 원칙과 실무 경험을 쌓았습니다.

en.title: Full Stack Engineer Career Path
en.text: Finished this massive career path in January 2025 - what a journey! It filled so many gaps from my apprenticeship and introduced me to modern tech like React, TypeScript, and Node.js. The full-stack approach was perfect as I got to see how everything connects. Building complete applications from scratch really boosted my confidence. Loved every minute of it!

es.title: Ruta Profesional de Ingeniero Full Stack
es.text: Completé la Ruta Profesional de Ingeniero Full Stack, adquiriendo habilidades tanto en el desarrollo front-end como en el back-end.

fr.title: Parcours de Carrière d'Ingénieur Full Stack
fr.text: J'ai terminé le Parcours de Carrière d'Ingénieur Full Stack, acquérant des compétences en développement front-end et back-end.

ko.title: 풀 스택 엔지니어 커리어 패스
ko.text: 풀 스택 엔지니어 커리어 패스를 완료하여 프론트엔드 및 백엔드 개발 기술을 습득했습니다.

en.title: HubSpot CMS for Developers 1 and 2
en.text: Completed both HubSpot developer courses back-to-back! Learnt how to build custom modules, templates, and integrations on the HubSpot platform. The HubL templating language was interesting to work with. Great for understanding CMS development beyond traditional approaches!

es.title: HubSpot CMS para Desarrolladores
es.text: Completé un curso sobre HubSpot CMS para Desarrolladores, aprendiendo cómo construir soluciones personalizadas en la plataforma de HubSpot.

fr.title: HubSpot CMS pour Développeurs
fr.text: J'ai suivi un cours sur HubSpot CMS pour Développeurs, apprenant à créer des solutions personnalisées sur la plateforme HubSpot.

ko.title: 개발자를 위한 HubSpot CMS
ko.text: HubSpot 플랫폼에서 사용자 정의 솔루션을 구축하는 방법을 배우는 개발자를 위한 HubSpot CMS 과정을 완료했습니다.

en.title: Free Code Camp Data Analysis with Python
en.text: Earned my Data Analysis certification from FreeCodeCamp! Worked extensively with pandas, NumPy, and data visualisation libraries. The projects were challenging but really practical. Analysing real datasets was the best way to learn!

es.title: Análisis de Datos con Python de Free Code Camp
es.text: Completé la certificación de Análisis de Datos con Python, centrándome en la manipulación y el análisis de datos utilizando Python.

fr.title: Analyse de Données avec Python de Free Code Camp
fr.text: J'ai obtenu la certification d'Analyse de Données avec Python, en me concentrant sur la manipulation et l'analyse de données à l'aide de Python.

ko.title: Free Code Camp의 Python을 이용한 데이터 분석
ko.text: Python을 사용한 데이터 조작 및 분석에 중점을 둔 Python을 사용한 데이터 분석 인증을 완료했습니다.

en.title: Cisco Data Analytics Essentials
en.text: Solid introduction to data analytics from Cisco's perspective. Covered the fundamentals of data analysis, visualisation, and basic statistics. The practical exercises helped cement the concepts. Good foundation for my later data science learning!

es.title: Fundamentos de Análisis de Datos de Cisco
es.text: Completé un curso sobre Fundamentos de Análisis de Datos de Cisco, adquiriendo conocimientos básicos en análisis de datos.

fr.title: Essentiels de l'Analyse de Données Cisco
fr.text: J'ai suivi un cours sur les Essentiels de l'Analyse de Données Cisco, acquérant des connaissances de base en analyse de données.

ko.title: Cisco 데이터 분석 필수 사항
ko.text: Cisco 데이터 분석 필수 사항 과정을 완료하여 데이터 분석에 대한 기본적인 지식을 습득했습니다.

en.title: Cisco Packet Tracer
en.text: Learnt network simulation using Cisco's Packet Tracer! Built virtual networks, configured routers and switches, and tested different network topologies. Really helped visualise how networks actually work. The hands-on simulation was way better than just theory!

es.title: Cisco Packet Tracer
es.text: Completé un curso sobre Cisco Packet Tracer, aprendiendo cómo simular configuraciones de red.

fr.title: Cisco Packet Tracer
fr.text: J'ai suivi un cours sur Cisco Packet Tracer, apprenant à simuler des configurations réseau.

ko.title: Cisco Packet Tracer
ko.text: Cisco Packet Tracer 과정을 완료하여 네트워크 구성을 시뮬레이션하는 방법을 배웠습니다.

en.title: AWS Skill Builder
en.text: Explored AWS services through their Skill Builder platform. Got hands-on with EC2, S3, and various other services. The practical labs were brilliant for understanding cloud concepts. Really complemented my Azure knowledge!

es.title: AWS Skill Builder
es.text: Participé en AWS Skill Builder para mejorar las habilidades y el conocimiento en computación en la nube.

fr.title: AWS Skill Builder
fr.text: J'ai participé à AWS Skill Builder pour améliorer mes compétences et connaissances en informatique cloud.

ko.title: AWS Skill Builder
ko.text: 클라우드 컴퓨팅 기술과 지식을 향상시키기 위해 AWS Skill Builder에 참여했습니다.

en.title: Build Chatbots with Python
en.text: Built my first chatbot from scratch in this course! Got hands-on with natural language processing and understood how chatbots actually work. The Python implementation was straightforward and the NLP concepts were explained brilliantly. Really enjoyed seeing my bot come to life!

es.title: Construye Chatbots con Python
es.text: Completé un curso sobre la construcción de chatbots con Python, adquiriendo habilidades en el procesamiento del lenguaje natural y el desarrollo de chatbots.

fr.title: Construire des Chatbots avec Python
fr.text: J'ai suivi un cours sur la construction de chatbots avec Python, acquérant des compétences en traitement du langage naturel et en développement de chatbots.

ko.title: Python으로 챗봇 만들기
ko.text: Python으로 챗봇을 만드는 과정을 완료하여 자연어 처리 및 챗봇 개발 기술을 습득했습니다.

en.title: Cloud Engineering and Data Science Bootcamp
en.text: Intensive bootcamp that covered both cloud engineering and data science - quite the combination! Got exposure to cloud architecture, DevOps practices, and data science fundamentals. The pace was fast but it gave me a great overview of both fields!

es.title: Bootcamp de Ingeniería en la Nube y Ciencia de Datos
es.text: Completé un bootcamp intensivo centrado en la ingeniería en la nube y la ciencia de datos.

fr.title: Bootcamp d'Ingénierie Cloud et Science des Données
fr.text: J'ai suivi un bootcamp intensif axé sur l'ingénierie cloud et la science des données.

ko.title: 클라우드 엔지니어링 및 데이터 과학 부트캠프
ko.text: 클라우드 엔지니어링 및 데이터 과학에 중점을 둔 집중 부트캠프를 완료했습니다.

en.title: Prompt Engineering Practices
en.text: This course was a real eye-opener! Learnt how to effectively communicate with AI models to get the best responses efficiently. The techniques for crafting prompts have been incredibly useful in my daily work. It's amazing how much difference the right prompt structure makes!

es.title: Prácticas de Ingeniería de Prompts
es.text: Completé un curso sobre Prácticas de Ingeniería de Prompts, aprendiendo cómo comunicarme eficazmente con modelos de IA.

fr.title: Pratiques d'Ingénierie des Prompts
fr.text: J'ai suivi un cours sur les Pratiques d'Ingénierie des Prompts, apprenant à communiquer efficacement avec les modèles d'IA.

ko.title: 프롬프트 엔지니어링 실습
ko.text: 프롬프트 엔지니어링 실습 과정을 완료하여 AI 모델과 효과적으로 소통하는 방법을 배웠습니다.

en.title: Intro to LLM's
en.text: Great introduction to Large Language Models! Learnt about different types like RAG and Zero-shot, and how these models are trained. The course demystified a lot of the 'magic' behind AI. Really helped me understand the fundamentals before diving deeper!

es.title: Introducción a LLM's
es.text: Completé un curso de introducción a los modelos de lenguaje grande

fr.title: Introduction aux LLM
fr.text: J'ai suivi un cours d'introduction aux grands modèles linguistiques

ko.title: LLM 소개
ko.text: 대규모 언어 모델을 소개하는 과정을 완료했습니다.

en.title: GCSE - 10 A* - C
en.text: Achieved 10 GCSEs including Maths, Sciences, English Literature, and Computer Science. This was where my love for technology really started - especially enjoyed the programming modules in Computer Science!

es.title: GCSE - 10 A* - C
es.text: Obtuve 10 GCSE con calificaciones de A* - C.

fr.title: GCSE - 10 A* - C
fr.text: J'ai obtenu 10 GCSE avec des notes de A* - C.
